languages.text: "Проктор Соломон Антар. Беглый осмотр участка выявил серьезные нарушения в хранении десятины. Доложите, насколько ущерб выходит за рамки погрешности".
"Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."
languages.original_text: "Проктор Соломон Антар. Беглый осмотр участка выявил серьезные нарушения в хранении десятины. Доложите, насколько ущерб выходит за рамки погрешности".

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."

languages.text: «Procurador Solomorne Anthar. Una inspección somera del lugar ha revelado graves errores en la custodia del diezmo. Explique en qué grado exceden estos daños el margen de error».
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."

traits.locale_text: «Procurador Solomorne Anthar. Una inspección somera del lugar ha revelado graves errores en la custodia del diezmo. Explique en qué grado exceden estos daños el margen de error».

languages.text: “我是索罗蒙·安萨监察官。我对现场进行了初步检查，发现什一税的保管工作出现了严重的不当行为，资源损失已经超出误差允许范围。”
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."

traits.locale_text: “我是索罗蒙·安萨监察官。我对现场进行了初步检查，发现什一税的保管工作出现了严重的不当行为，资源损失已经超出误差允许范围。”

languages.text: 「代理人ソロモーン・アンサール。現場の大ざっぱな調査で租税の管理に重大な不正があることがわかった。誤差の許容範囲を超える損害の程度を報告せよ」
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."

traits.locale_text: 「代理人ソロモーン・アンサール。現場の大ざっぱな調査で租税の管理に重大な不正があることがわかった。誤差の許容範囲を超える損害の程度を報告せよ」

languages.text: « Proctor Solomorne Anthar. Une inspection sommaire du site a révélé de graves irrégularités dans la prise en charge de la dîme. Dans quelle mesure les pertes enregistrées excèdent-elles la marge d'erreur autorisée ? »
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."

traits.locale_text: « Proctor Solomorne Anthar. Une inspection sommaire du site a révélé de graves irrégularités dans la prise en charge de la dîme. Dans quelle mesure les pertes enregistrées excèdent-elles la marge d'erreur autorisée ? »

languages.text: "Ben Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. Sahada yapılan üstünkörü bir teftiş, aşarın muhafazasında ciddi usulsüzlükler olduğunu ortaya çıkardı. Hasarın hata payını ne ölçüde aştığını bildir."
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. Sahada yapılan üstünkörü bir teftiş, aşarın muhafazasında ciddi usulsüzlükler olduğunu ortaya çıkardı. Hasarın hata payını ne ölçüde aştığını bildir."

languages.text: "Proktor Solomorne Anthar. Eine oberflächliche Inspektion der Anlage hat erhebliche Unregelmäßig hinsichtlich der Verwahrung des Zehnts ergeben. In welchem Ausmaß überschreitet der Schaden die Fehlertoleranz?"
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar. A cursory inspection of the site has revealed serious improprieties in the custody of the tithe. Report the extent to which the damage exceeds the margin of error."
